nodes.text: A Tatooine sand casting was a type of artwork. During the Clone Wars, a stolen Tatooine sand casting that depicted a Tusken Raider in battle and was valued at 2,500 was taken to a hotel room in the Starlight Lounge on the planet Genarius by the minions of the Rodian slaver Gomalo. Members of the Imperial upper class saw these sand castings as unique conversation pieces.
